title: Fundamentals of Electric Circuits 5th Alexander text + solutions
description:
Fundamentals of Electric Circuits, 5th Edition (c2013), textbook + instructor solutions manual (ISM) by Charles K. Alexander & Matthew N. O. Sadiku.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://highered.mcgraw-hill.com/sites/0073380571/information_center_view0/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://highered.mcgraw-hill.com/sites/0073380571/information_center_view0/</a>
(ISBN-10: 0073380571)

BRIEF CONTENTS:
---------------
PART 1 - DC Circuits
 1. Basic Concepts
 2. Basic Laws
 3. Methods of Analysis
 4. Circuit Theorems
 5. Operational Amplifiers
 6. Capacitors and Inductors
 7. First-Order Circuits
 8. Second-Order Circuits
PART 2 - AC Circuits
 9. Sinusoids and Phasors
 10. Sinusoidal Steady-State Analysis
 11. AC Power Analysis
 12. Three-Phase Circuits
 13. Magnetically Coupled Circuits
 14. Frequency Response
PART 3 - Advanced Circuit Analysis
 15. Introduction to the Laplace Transform
 16. Applications of the Laplace Transform
 17. The Fourier Series
 18. Fourier Transform
 19. Two-Port Networks
APPENDICES:
 A: Simultaneous Equations and Matrix Inversion
 B: Complex Numbers
 C: Mathematical Formulas
 D: Answers to Odd-Numbered Problems
(detailed contents at website above)

FILE INFO: paginated (text), bookmarked (text+ISM), true PDF (text+ISM); foldered.
